title: Hello World with InteractiveWriteDraw tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to write text on an interactive whiteboard.

Select **InteractiveWriteDraw** to create an interactive whiteboard on your device

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/InteractiveWriteDraw-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open on this device_ to open it locally

Move the **text** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/text.png)
you aslo can draw a line
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/line.png)
and a point
![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/point.png)
Write hello world in the text component ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/hello%20world.png)

Press ![play](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/play.png) to try the system.

![play](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/write.png)
